thread.title: Austin Associates to Sponsor Webinar on Technology Trends for Community Banks on October 8 - CBS
thread.title_full: Austin Associates to Sponsor Webinar on Technology Trends for Community Banks on October 8 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Austin Associates to Sponsor Webinar on Technology Trends for Community Banks on October 8 - CBS
text:
When it comes to technology for financial institutions one size does not fit all! This webinar will discuss outsourcing vs. in-house technology and the best options for serving the specific needs of today's financial institutions.
Toledo, OH (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Austin Associates will host a complimentary webinar on Thursday, October 8 at 11 a.m. - "Technology Trends for Community Banks: Is Outsourced Processing Right for Your Bank?"
Learn what's trending in technology; reasons banks change the delivery of their processing; strengths and weaknesses of outsourcing and in-house technology; and strategies to review technology options. To register go to http://www.austinassociates.com .
Stephen Heckard, Managing Director of Austin's Technology Solutions, will lead the discussion with insights from Warren Bauder, Chief Technology Officer at First Security Bank, Bozeman, MT, and Chad Hoffman, President and Chief Executive Officer, Richwood Banking Company, Richwood, OH.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb12991532.htm
